title: Save up to $150 on AirPods in Amazon’s incredible blowout sale
content:
Macworld

Apple’s AirPods are often on sale at Amazon, but we’ve never seen a sale this amazing. Every model—from the newest USB-C AirPods Pro to the high-end AirPods Max is on sale and we’ve never seen so many models at such low prices.

  • AirPods Pro (2nd-gen) – $169 ($80 off) The 2nd-gen AirPods Pro with USB-C are some of the best earbuds you can get, with incredible audio quality, excellent noise canceling, and superb battery life.
  • AirPods (3rd-gen) – $129 ($40 off) We awarded the 3rd-gen AirPods our Editor’s Choice award for a reason—they have great sound quality and battery life with a light design.
  • AirPods (2nd gen) – $69 ($60 off) The 2nd-gen AirPods are a few years old but are a great entry-level model with great sound and battery life.
  • AirPods Max – $399 ($150 off) If you prefer headphones over earbuds, AirPods Max are simply fantastic with a gorgeous design, top-notch active noise canceling, and incredible sound quality.

Of course, AirPods aren’t just about music—they also make it easy to answer calls, summon Siri, and share songs with friends. All models offer a superior audio experience with Personalized Spatial Audio with head tracking (3rd-gen, Pro, Max), Adaptive Audio and Conversation Awareness (Pro), sweat and water resistance (3rd gen, Pro), and a charging case (2nd-gen, 3rd-gen, Pro).

So whether you’re looking to get your first pair of AirPods or need to upgrade an old set, there’s never been a better time to buy.
